Basically follows the [VS Code instructions](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/setup/linux). Download and install the `.deb` package.

```bash
sudo dpkg -i code_1.84.2-1699528352_amd64.deb
```

This will add the repo to your apt configuration and VS Code will automatically update when updates are available.
